setting.time: 64 AD, early morning, first light of dawn breaking
setting.location: Ancient Appian Way outside Rome, stone road where legend was born
setting.weather: Clear cold morning with frost, mist rising from valleys, approaching spring

characters.appearance: Apostle Peter, elderly man in his sixties, weathered face showing years of ministry, eyes wide with spiritual vision
characters.clothing: Simple brown traveling robe, rope belt, worn sandals, staff in hand, no worldly possessions
characters.position: Standing on ancient stone road fleeing Rome, suddenly stopped by divine apparition
characters.action: Encountering vision of Christ walking toward Rome, asking 'Quo vadis, Domine?' - Where are you going, Lord?

scene.mainElements: Same panoramic view of Rome but now in winter season, bare trees instead of summer foliage, frost covering surfaces, thin ice on water features
scene.details: Divine light revealing Christ walking toward Rome to be crucified again, ancient stones of Appian Way witnessing sacred moment, early morning mist swirling around divine figure, small chapel marking the spot for future pilgrims, tombs lining road silent witnesses to miraculous encounter
scene.background: Same distant hills but snow-capped, aqueducts with ice formations, city showing subtle changes from passage of time, familiar but evolved
scene.atmosphere: Sacred encounter transforming cowardice to courage, legendary moment inspiring centuries of faith, divine love overcoming human fear, eternal story of redemption made manifest, wisdom of Christ's infinite sacrifice revealed

composition.cameraAngle: Wide establishing shot of ancient road with divine light
composition.focus: Apostle Peter encountering Christ's vision on stone road
composition.depth: Foreground ancient paving stones of Appian Way, middle ground Peter with divine vision, background Rome in distance with rising sun

colorPalette.usageNotes: Rich, regal colors with metallic tones

rendering.detailLevel: high in key areas, atmospheric distance
